name: Catlum & Musenna
description:
Catlum & Musenna is a game being created by Team Splitscreen, a group of RPI students in the Games Capstone class. In this local co-op action game, you and another player play as mice fighting against cats. The game is set in a heaven and hell setting. In the game, both players have to fight to bring down the boss's shared health, while dodging all sorts of attacks from the boss. To aid with this, the players can swap positions in order to gain an advantageous position.

Controls:

Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys/Left Joystick

Attack - F/Forward Slash/X or Square on Controller

Jump - G/Period/A or X on Controller

Dodge - H/Comma/R2 on Controller

Pause - ESC/Start

Down Attack and Up Attack are possible for the melee character

Hold Attack to charge a beam for the ranged character

Down + Jump to fall through the platform

The team is as follows:

Dennis Chen - Backend, Player, and Boss Programmer

Zhanbo Lin - Boss Programmer

Brandon O'Hara - Project Manager

Yiran(Lisa) Zhang - Sound Design, Heaven Art, Boss Art, and Cover Art

Aria Maghsoodlou - Gameplay and Systems Designer

Ely Hernandez - Player Art and Hell Art

*Assets from Hero Knight by Sven are used for the player as the mice animations were never finished
